Brian Button wrote:

> Has anyone ported junit to MIDP and J2ME yet? I'm working on an application,
> and I'd like to avoid reinventing the wheel if possible :)
>

J2MEUnit is available for download at:

    http://www.xprogramming.com/software.htm

I haven't tried it, but it looks like a great start.

Mike
subject: Re: [junit] JUnit testing for MIDP applications?
